resources.string: %1$s - %2$s has been added to your favourites.
%1$s - %2$s has been removed from your favourites.
No result found ! \nBe sure you are connected to internet !
TROOM, called TROuve Ma Musique in French and means Find My Music, is an application that allows you to find your music using a few words of the lyrics.
The project is open source and you can find it here.
